member.name: M:MMTTest.Controllers.CategoryController.GetAll
member.summary: Returns all stored entities of the type Category

member.name: M:MMTTest.Controllers.ProductController.GetAll
member.summary: Returns all stored entities of the type Product

member.name: M:MMTTest.Controllers.ProductController.GetFeatured
member.summary: Returns featured Product entities; SKUs to "feature" defined in configuration

member.name: M:MMTTest.Controllers.ProductController.GetByCategory(System.String)
member.summary: Returns Product entities in the specified Category

member.name: M:MMTTest.Controllers.ProductController.GetBySku(System.String)
member.summary: Returns a single Product with the specified SKU
